DOC.brief_summary: Subjects Ulcerative Colitis complete induction study PF-00547659 receive additional 144 week open-label treatment evaluate long-term safety drug .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Of PF-00547659 In Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 66 year age . Subjects previously enrol study A7281009 ( NCT01620255 ) complete 84 day ( 12 week ) induction period . Subjects complete Day 84 ( Week 12 ) study A7281009 experience serious event ( ) relate investigational product , unstable medical condition , reason , opinion investigator , would preclude entry participation study . Subjects take dose Azathioprine ( AZA ) , 6mercaptopurine ( 6 MP ) Methotrexate ( MTX ) .
